[h1]Overview[/h1] V1.1
Optional Expansion for Medical Supplements: Adds social items for use.
[b](Note this mod is dependant on the Medical Supplements mod to work.)[/b]
[h1]Details[/h1]
The following PDF document provides an understanding what this mod offers:
[url=https://1drv.ms/b/s!Au3GsmKyQkDYispEPTdxW3va6zdhcQ?e=ScmDw1]Social Supplements Notes[/url]
[h1]Mod Notes[/h1]
There are mood alterations associated with the above drugs as relevant and in keeping with a vanilla theme as best as possible, whilst still allowing for refinement.
Research projects associated and bulk recipes provided.
Mod option to vary the base research costs by a percentage level.
Bulk recipes for the vanilla drugs: Pekoe tea, flake, yayo, go-juice, wake-up and smokeleaf joints have been added.
Save compatible (Note: You will need to reassign new drug policies if part way through a savegame to schedule the use of the above SS drugs) and mod friendly. To remove the mod you would have to remove all items introduced first.
[h1]Recommended[/h1]
[url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2000335507]Drug Policy Fix (V1.1)[/url]; can be used to help manage and correct drugs added or removed part way through a save game. It will also sort the drug listings alphabetically.
[h1]Compatability Notes[/h1] *** Subject to conversion ***
[b]Apothecary[/b] - Can make Cayenne pepper powder, which doesn't spoil, can be used in food recipes and to make hot sauce. [b]RimCuisine V1.2[/b]: Will use fruits and fungi in recipes. [b]RimCuisine 2[/b]: Will use fruits and fungi in recipes. Will use chilli peppers to make hot sauce. [b]Seeds Please[/b] - includes patch support to generate seeds/shoots/spores for plants used in this mod. [b]Smokeleaf Industry[/b] - Vaping products will additionally use Buds in their recipes. [b]Smokeleaf Industry Reborn[/b] - Vaping products will additionally use Buds in their recipes. [b]VCE/VPE[/b] - fruits, peppers and other items will be used in applicable recipes. [b]VGP Vegetable Garden[/b]: Will use fruits and mushroom in recipes. (Best putting VGP Garden before supplement mods). [b]VGP Garden Medicine[/b] - Some vanilla bulk recipes are not added due to potential duplication.
